title:
Exhaust Gas Recirculation Valve, Z22SE (MY 2002,
MY 2003 and MY 2004)

steps.text:
For this test it is necessary to drive the
vehicle.

Start the engine and drive the vehicle slowly in
first gear (Automatic Transmission in 1).

Alternate the engine speed between 1500 and 2500
revs/min in partial load to allow the Exhaust Gas Recirculation
valve to be actuated.

Download Setup file (the Tech 32 uses only Setup
files, no reference curves).

For this test it is necessary to drive the
vehicle.

Start the engine and drive the vehicle slowly in
first gear (Automatic Transmission in 1).

Alternate the engine speed between 1500 and 2500
revs/min in partial load to allow the Exhaust Gas Recirculation
valve to be actuated.
